name: CMSensorRecorder
desc: An object that gathers and retrieves accelerometer data from a device.

items.name: class func isAccelerometerRecordingAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether accelerometer recording is supported on the current device.

items.name: class func authorizationStatus() -> CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Returns a value indicating whether the app is authorized to record sensor data.

items.name: enum CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The authorization status for motion-related features.

items.name: func recordAccelerometer(forDuration: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Begins recording accelerometer data for the specified period of time.

items.name: func accelerometerData(from: Date, to: Date) -> CMSensorDataList?
items.desc: Retrieves the accelerometer data collected between the specified dates.
